alert.note: Alert for Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lexington and central Richland Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, St. Andrews, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market and Woodfield. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 54 and 76. Interstate 26 between mile markers 98 and 120. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
